description.value: You know there's so much more to sensation than whips and chainsâ€”but whips and chains also have their place. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Telekinetic Maneuver]{Telekinetic Maneuver} and @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Web]{Web} once per day each as 2nd-level divine innate spells; in both cases, the spells manifest shadowy chains rather than their usual visual signifiers.
